title: The history of Timon of Athens, the man-hater as it is acted at the Dukes Theatre : made into a play / by Tho. Shadwell.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
publisher: Printed by J.M. for Henry Herringman ...,
notes: Shakespeare's play greatly altered. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
